channel.title: Shrub Roses on JOJOLENSHOP
channel.description: Recent content in Shrub Roses on JOJOLENSHOP

item.title: Comprehensive Guide to Rose Varieties | Beginner's Gardening Tips by Jojo Len
item.description: Roses—often called the queen of flowers—are not only a symbol of romance, but also a favorite of gardeners around the world. For those who are just beginning their gardening journey, understanding the different types of roses and their basic care is the very first step toward creating a slow-living garden of your own.
